ResourceHeader.Description: Observatory Group created to represent the chain of stations based in Antartica that have Augsburg College search coil magnetometers. The chain of stations includes: British Antarctic Survey A80, British Antarctic Survey A81, British Antarctic Survey A84, Halley Bay, and South Pole. The Magnetometer Array for Cusp and Cleft Studies program operates magnetometers in the northern hemisphere arctic to study the near-Earth space environment.
